title: IIT Bombay Placements 2025: Average Package, Highest ...
snippet: The highest package is 46 LPA, average is 30 LPA, and the lowest is 15 LPA. Top companies that come for recruitment are Google, Microsoft, Amazon, and NVIDIA.

title: IIT Bombay Placements - 1650 Job Offers With 558 ...
snippet: 3 Sept 2025 — IIT Bombay had 1650 job offers, 558 above 20 LPA, 22 above 1 crore, 74.5% placement rate, 23.50 LPA average, and 17.92 LPA median package.
